verses.verse: And it came to pass after<WH310> these things<WH1697>, that Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158> had a vineyard<WH3754>, which was in Jezreel<WH3157>, hard by<WH681> the palace<WH1964> of Ahab<WH256> king<WH4428> of Samaria<WH8111>.

And Naboth<WH5022> said<WH559> to Ahab<WH256>, Jehovah<WH3068> forbid<WH2486> it me<WH5414>, that I should give the inheritance<WH5159> of my fathers unto thee<WH1>.

And Ahab<WH256> came<WH935> into his house<WH1004> heavy<WH5620> and displeased<WH2198> because of the word<WH1697> which Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158> had spoken<WH1696> to him<WH559>; for he had said, I will not give<WH5414> thee the inheritance<WH5159> of my fathers<WH1>. And he laid him down<WH7901> upon his bed<WH4296>, and turned away<WH5437> his face<WH6440>, and would eat<WH398> no bread<WH3899>.
But Jezebel<WH348> his wife<WH802> came<WH935> to him<WH1696>, and said unto him<WH7307>, Why is thy spirit so sad<WH5620>, that thou eatest<WH398> no bread<WH3899>?

And he said<WH1696> unto her<WH1696>, Because I spake unto Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH5414>, Give me thy vineyard<WH3754> for money<WH3701>; or else<WH2655>, if it please thee<WH5414>, I will give thee another vineyard<WH3754> for it<WH559>: and he answered, I will not give<WH5414> thee my vineyard<WH3754>.

And Jezebel<WH348> his wife<WH802> said<WH559> unto him<WH6213>, Dost thou now govern the kingdom<WH4410> of Israel<WH3478>? arise<WH6965>, and eat<WH398> bread<WH3899>, and let thy heart<WH3820> be merry<WH3190>: I will give<WH5414> thee the vineyard<WH3754> of Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158>.

So she wrote<WH3789> letters<WH5612> in Ahab<WH256>'s name<WH8034>, and sealed<WH2856> them with his seal<WH2368>, and sent<WH7971> the letters<WH5612> unto the elders<WH2205> and to the nobles<WH2715> that were in his city<WH5892>, and that dwelt<WH3427> with Naboth<WH5022>.
And she wrote<WH3789> in the letters<WH5612>, saying<WH559>, Proclaim<WH7121> a fast<WH6685>, and set<WH3427> Naboth<WH5022> on high<WH7218> among the people<WH5971>:

and set<WH3427> two<WH8147> men<WH582>, base<WH1100> fellows<WH1121>, before him<WH5749>, and let them bear witness against him<WH559>, saying, Thou didst curse<WH1288> God<WH430> and the king<WH4428>. And then carry him out<WH3318>, and stone<WH5619> him to death<WH4191>.

And the men<WH582> of his city<WH5892>, even the elders<WH2205> and the nobles<WH2715> who dwelt<WH3427> in his city<WH5892>, did<WH6213> as Jezebel<WH348> had sent<WH7971> unto them<WH3789>, according as it was written in the letters<WH5612> which she had sent unto them<WH7971>.
They proclaimed<WH7121> a fast<WH6685>, and set<WH3427> Naboth<WH5022> on high<WH7218> among the people<WH5971>.

And the two<WH8147> men<WH582>, the base<WH1100> fellows<WH1121>, came<WH935> in and sat<WH3427> before him<WH1100>: and the base fellows<WH582> bare witness<WH5749> against him<WH5022>, even against Naboth, in the presence of the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Naboth<WH5022> did curse<WH1288> God<WH430> and the king<WH4428>. Then they carried him forth<WH3318> out<WH2351> of the city<WH5892>, and stoned<WH5619> him to death<WH4191> with stones<WH68>.

And it came to pass<WH348>, when Jezebel heard<WH8085> that Naboth<WH5022> was stoned<WH5619>, and was dead<WH4191>, that Jezebel<WH348> said<WH559> to Ahab<WH256>, Arise<WH6965>, take possession<WH3423> of the vineyard<WH3754> of Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158>, which he refused<WH3985> to give<WH5414> thee for money<WH3701>; for Naboth<WH5022> is not alive<WH2416>, but dead<WH4191>.

And it came to pass<WH256>, when Ahab heard<WH8085> that Naboth<WH5022> was dead<WH4191>, that Ahab<WH256> rose up<WH6965> to go down<WH3381> to the vineyard<WH3754> of Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158>, to take possession of it<WH3423>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came to Elijah<WH452> the Tishbite<WH8664>, saying<WH559>,

And thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto him<WH559>, saying, Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Hast thou killed<WH7523> and also taken possession<WH3423>? And thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto him<WH559>, saying, Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, In the place<WH4725> where dogs<WH3611> licked<WH3952> the blood<WH1818> of Naboth<WH5022> shall dogs<WH3611> lick<WH3952> thy blood<WH1818>, even thine.

And Ahab<WH256> said<WH559> to Elijah<WH452>, Hast thou found<WH4672> me<WH341>, O mine enemy? And he answered<WH559>, I have found<WH4672> thee<WH4376>, because thou hast sold thyself to do<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

Behold <WH935>, I will bring evil<WH7451> upon thee<WH310>, and will utterly sweep thee away<WH1197> and will cut off<WH3772> from Ahab<WH256> every man-child<WH8366>, <WH7023> and him that is shut up<WH6113> and him that is left<WH5800> at large in Israel<WH3478>:

and I will make<WH5414> thy house<WH1004> like the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat<WH5028>, and like the house<WH1004> of Baasha<WH1201> the son<WH1121> of Ahijah<WH281> for the provocation<WH3708> wherewith thou hast provoked me to anger<WH3707>, and hast made Israel<WH3478> to sin<WH2398>.
And of Jezebel<WH348> also spake<WH1696> Jehovah<WH3068>, saying<WH559>, The dogs<WH3611> shall eat<WH398> Jezebel<WH348> by the rampart<WH2426> of Jezreel<WH3157>.
Him that dieth<WH4191> of Ahab<WH256> in the city<WH5892> the dogs<WH3611> shall eat<WH398>; and him that dieth<WH4191> in the field<WH7704> shall the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064> eat<WH398>.

(But there was none like unto Ahab<WH256>, who did sell<WH4376> himself to do<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>, whom Jezebel<WH348> his wife<WH802> stirred up<WH5496>.

And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came to Elijah<WH452> the Tishbite<WH8664>, saying<WH559>,

Seest <WH7200> thou how Ahab<WH256> humbleth<WH3665> himself before<WH6440> me<WH3282>? because he humbleth<WH3665> himself before<WH6440> me<WH935>, I will not bring the evil<WH7451> in his days<WH3117>; but in his son<WH1121>'s days<WH3117> will I bring<WH935> the evil<WH7451> upon his house<WH1004>.
